kontext: Hi, my name is Ali and I am fourteen. I always get up at 7 a.m. Then I wash my face and brush my teeth. I have breakfast at about 7.30. I usually have milk for breakfast. I usually take the bus to school but sometimes my parents take me, too. After school, I arrive home at about 3.30 pm. When I get home, I rest for a while. Then I usually do my homework or surf on the Net. We have dinner at about 7 pm. I often watch movies or listen to music in the evenings. I rarely stay up late and usually go to bed before 11 pm.
soru_metni: Ali comes home after school at - - - -.

kontext: Hi, everybody! I'm Elliot. Saturday is my favourite day. I usually get up at 10 o'clock. I have a big breakfast with my family. Then I go to swimming pool. In the afternoon I always meet with friends and we have lunch at our favourite café. I usually have a cheese sandwich. After lunch, we usually go to the cinema. If the weather is bad we hang out at the mall. We love looking at the shop windows but we rarely do shopping together. I always stay at home on Saturday evenings and do my homework. After I finish my homework, I often watch a DVD with mum and dad. We like comedy movies. Before I go to bed I always listen to some relaxing music.
soru_metni: Elliot never ---

secenekler.A: listens to music before going to bed
